## What would you like to see?

Describe the feature or improvement you have in mind.

## Why would this be useful?

How would this help you (or other mentors) track student progress better?

## How might it work?

If you have ideas about implementation, share them here. No pressure though. Just the idea itself is valuable.

## Anything else?

Additional context, examples, or screenshots that help explain the idea.
